snippet: A professional golfer has flown more than 15 million miles, and once scared a woman who thought he had died in the aisle of a plane.
abstract: Frequent Flier column features professional golfer Gary Player discussing his flying experiences.
lead_paragraph: A professional golfer has flown more than 15 million miles, and once scared a woman who thought he had died in the aisle of a plane.

headline.seo: A Golf Pro Learns to Be Comfortable in the Air
headline.main: A Lifetime of Coping With the Trials of Flying
headline.print_headline: A Lifetime of Coping With the Trials of Flying
